features: Ergonomic design, adjustable armrests, 180-degree recline, lumbar support, headrest cushion
description: The Fantech Alpha GC-185 Gaming Chair offers an ergonomic design for extended gaming sessions. Its features include adjustable armrests, a 180-degree recline function, lumbar support, and a headrest cushion. This gaming chair is designed for both comfort and style, making it a great addition to your gaming setup. It supports gamers up to 280 lbs.

features: Racecar-style design, adjustable seat height, 160-degree recline, lumbar support, neck pillow
description: The Fantech Commander GC-182 Gaming Chair features a sleek racecar-inspired design for gamers who appreciate style and comfort. It includes adjustable seat height, a 160-degree recline function, lumbar support, and a neck pillow for added comfort during gaming. This chair can support gamers up to 250 lbs.

features: RGB lighting, adjustable armrests, 170-degree recline, lumbar support, neck pillow
description: The Fantech Hex RGB Gaming Chair not only offers comfort but also style with RGB lighting. It comes with adjustable armrests, a 170-degree recline feature, lumbar support, and a neck pillow for maximum comfort. The RGB lighting adds a touch of flair to your gaming setup. This chair is suitable for gamers up to 300 lbs.
